Email Conversation Export
=========================

From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-16 16:22
Subject: Live with ExCom,  Live Q&A: Fatherhood & all that comes with it, Cyber News - AI Data Accuracy
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f6f94f4f0a77d3a52f8897f5c482fd51836209232.gif> 	

Based on your feedback we have changed the format this year, Live with ExCom 2025 on June 24th will be purely dedicated to answering your questions!​

Starting today we will be sharing daily videos from our ExCom members on One Chalhoub. These short, pre-recorded updates aim to set the stage for meaningful conversations during the live session next week. These videos will have updates from our ExCom members where you will hear about our Group's objectives, performance to-date, achievements so far this year, and what to expect for the second half of this year.

We're kicking off the week with Michael Chalhoub, our Group CEO, sharing updates on the market, and the year we have had so far and how to drive success for the second half of this year. ​

Starting today we will be sharing daily videos from our ExCom members on One Chalhoub. These short, pre-recorded updates aim to set the stage for meaningful conversations during the live session next week. These videos will have updates from our ExCom members where you will hear about our Group's objectives, performance to-date, achievements so far this year, and what to expect for the second half of this year.

We're kicking off the week with Michael Chalhoub, our Group CEO, sharing updates on the market, and the year we have had so far and how to drive success for the second half of this year. ​

Watch the full video here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1251&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1251&user=10620> 	

You can ask your questions anonymously in advance here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1252&user=10620> .​
 It’s a time for open dialogue, clarity, and connection. ​

Register here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1253&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-2-min.png> 	

Live Q&A: Fatherhood & All that Comes with it

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a202f9cb81997936adc605f26cb4d8d1480238160.png> 	

In honour of Father’s Day, we invite all fathers, seasoned, new and expectant to join us for dedicated Q&A session exploring the shifts, challenges, and rewards of early fatherhood.

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a202f9cb81997936adc605f26cb4d8d1480238160.png> 	

In honour of Father’s Day, we invite all fathers, seasoned, new and expectant to join us for dedicated Q&A session exploring the shifts, challenges, and rewards of early fatherhood.

This conversation offers practical insights and a space to reflect and connect. You can share your thoughts anonymously ahead of time via this link.

Please check your inbox for the calendar invite.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

Cyber News – AI Data Accuracy

Artificial Intelligence is rapidly transforming the way we live and work — but with great power comes great responsibility. In this edition of Cyber News, we take a closer look at a growing concern in the AI space: the accuracy of the data it provides.

Watch the video <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1254&user=10620>  to stay informed on the risks and realities of AI data accuracy.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1254&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1255&user=10620>
